text_block_list.text: Uma Musume that were aiming to debut used the 『Selection Race』 to show off their abilities, hoping to be scouted by trainers
For Tracen Academy, it was one of the most important events. And today, that event was happening! Immediately when I arrived at the course―

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Oh? Are you, perhaps…… that lost trainer that I met the other day!?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Fufufu, sorry about that. It was quite a memorable day, so I couldn't help it～

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: You've come to watch the Selection Races, I see. I'm participating in the last group today, so I'd be happy if you stayed until then.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Well then, I should go get prepared. The sunlight is a little strong, so be careful about that.
With a gentle smile and calm voice that never wavered, Grass Wonder made her way to the course.
And so, the races continued one after another―

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Awawawa, next up is my group……! I-I-I'm getting nervous～……!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Nahaha! Spe-chan, you're too stiff. At this rate, you'll turn to stone!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Stone!? T-then I won't be able to run～!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Now now, Spe-chan. Relax～, just relax～.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: 『Actions are the seeds of fate』. Spe-chan, you've spent this whole time training as hard as you could for today, right?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: All that's left is to believe in yourself and run as best as you can, and it should lead to good results.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Grass-chan……! Uuuh, Thanks～……!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Don't worry about it～. ……Huh?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Hmmm～…… El? Could you move over there a little bit?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Que? Haah, like this?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Why are you asking this all of a sudden, Grass……!?
Suddenly, an Uma Musume that was running in the race, came around the curve with too much momentum!

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume Participant
text_block_list.text: Wawawawawaa!! S-sorry……!!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Are you hurt～? Maybe you should get that looked at, just in case.

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume Participant
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I'll do that…… I'm really sorry about that!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: T-take care～……

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Buhaaaaa! T-that scared me……!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: But that's amazing Grass-chan! There's no limit to how calm you can be……!!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Fufu, no no～. El, I'm glad you're okay too～.

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: That girl, Grass Wonder……was it? Even at such a big event, she's so calm, huh! That kind of mental fortitude would be a powerful asset.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: On top of that, it's not just her mentality…… Considering her results so far, her physical specs are high too. She'll be the favorite in the last group.
And with everyone's attention focused on her, the race that Grass Wonder was participating in, began……!
With everyone's attention on her, Grass Wonder took position in the middle, and it seemed like she was calmly observing the situation, however―

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Ah, Grass Wonder is out in front! ……But, the way she's running right now, doesn't something seem a little off……?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: It looked like the girl running next to her stumbled a little too. The previous races might have left the course in poor condition.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Grass might have pushed forward early to avoid a collision……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa……!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: With 200m remaining, Grass Wonder is in the lead! But…… she's being chased!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Will Grass Wonder be able to stay ahead!? And the way this battle ends is――!!
The result― Grass Wonder was passed at the very last moment, being beaten in to 2nd by a nose.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Grass-chan, good work out there……! Um, well……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: ……Hmmm～, it was unfortunate! It seems like I was one step short in the end～.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: But, it was still a reasonable result. I'll do my best so that next time I can finish 1st.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah…… Y-yeah! Let's do our best together!

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Grass was so close, huh. If there wasn't that trouble in the middle of it, in terms of ability, I think she would have finished first……!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: But her situational awareness is top notch. Grass Wonder, I'd definitely want her to join us……!
It was an unfortunate result, but the reactions were positive. There would definitely be a lot of people scouting her.
Or, that's what I thought―

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ……Grass!!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Oh, El? Is something wrong?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: If…… you're going to do more night training, I'll do it with you, okay?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: ……No, no, there was a race today, after all. I was planning on resting.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Well then, I'll excuse myself here.
――『Grass Wonder is refusing all scouting requests』
It wasn't long before that rumor started to circulate.
